title: A wave of new restrictions have been implemented for Melbourne residents as Victoria races to contain another COVID-19 outbreak.
description:: No lockdown has yet been announced, and Melbourne residents are allowed to travel, however, if a Melbourne resident visits regional Victoria, the restrictions travel with them.

description: To build trust and to make people feel safe about engaging in local tourism, each activity has a COVID safety rating. This rating is determined by reviews of those who have already experienced the activity. The review questions are based on the COVID-safe criteria for businesses found on the NSW and Victorian government websites.
Seek immediate medical attention if you have serious symptoms like fever, dry cough and tiredness. Always call before visiting your doctor or health facility.
activityLocation: Entry to the Wilds and ice-skate hire

description: If you can not use this activity due to Covid-19 restrictions in place please contact us. we would be delighted to assist you.
activityName: Hot Air Balloon Experience over the Yarra Valley
activityLocation: Balgownie Estate (1309 Melba Highway, Yarra Glen)
